Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all its benefits, I'm offering it to you for $12000. I'm confident this investment will provide you with significant value and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
